name: Windows Down Eau de Parfum with Grapefruit + Bergamot
ingredients: Alcohol Denat., 1,4-Methanonaphthalen-6(2h)-One,Octahydro-7-Methyl-, 1,6-Nonadien-3-Ol,3,7-Dimethyl-,Acetate, 1,2,3,4,4a,7,8,8a-Octahydro-2,4a,5,8a-Tetramethyl-Naphthyl Formate, 2-(1-(3',3'-Dimethyl-1'-Cyclohexyl)Ethoxy)-2-Methyl Propyl Propanoate, Methyl Dihydroxy-Dimethylbenzoate, Trans-3,7-Dimethyl-2,6-Octadien-1-Yl Ethanoate, [(2z)-3,7-Dimethylocta-2,6-Dienyl] Acetate, 4-(2,6,6-Trimethylcyclohexen-1-Yl)But-3-En-2-One 3-Hexenol, 4h-Indeno4,5-D-1,3-Dioxole,3a,5,6,7,8,8b-Hexahydro-2,2,6,6,7,8,8-Heptamethyl-, 3,7-Dimethyl-6-Octen-1-Yl Acetate, Acetic Acid,Hexyl Ester, Cyclopentadecanone, Decanal, Dimethyl-4-Isoheptenal Dimethyl Acetal, Ethyl Linalool, Ethylene Brassylate, Guaiacwood Oil, Methyl Dihydrojasmonate, Hexadecanolide, Isopropyl Myristate, Linalool, Linalyl Acetate, Medium Chain Triglycerides, Meth-2(2-Pentenyl)2-Cyclopenten-1-One/3-, Methylcyclopentadecenone, Ambroxide, Spartium Junceum Oils, Pentadecalactone, Phenethyl Alcohol, Rose Ketone-4, T-Butyl Alcohol, Terpineol Acetate, Tetrahydro-Methyl-Methylpropyl)-Pyran-4-Ol, Tetramethyl Acetyloctahydronaphthalenes, Water, 2-Acetonaphthone, Ambrocenide, Methylbenzodioxepinone , Acetic Acid,(Cyclohexyloxy)-,2-Propenyl Este, Denatonium Benzoate, Ethyl 2,2-Dimethylhydrocinnamal, Gamma-Octalactone, Ionone, Alpha-Nonanal, Grapefruit Oils, Lemon Oils, Mandarin Oils, Mate Oils, Tocopherol...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Spray onto wrists and neck to intensify fragrance with the warmth of your body. .-Henry Rose fine fragrances can be worn alone or layered  to create a personalized, signature scent...Recycling Instructions:.-Outer carton is made from FSC hemp paper and is compostable and recyclable.

shades.shade_name: 1.7 oz / 50 ml eau de parfum spray

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with this scent. It’s so good, I can’t stop smelling myself. I also really love the transparency on the ingredients. All around great product. Love love love! Instant Henry Rose loyal customer.
